item.title: How to be creative
item.description: How analogy making is the mechanism for creativity. Analogy in physics The history of physics shows us that the search for analogies between two distinct categories of phenomena has perhaps been the surest and most fruitful method of all the procedures put into play in the construction of physical theories.

item.title: Did LTCM were too greed?
item.description: What was LTCM trade? They traded spreads in the bond market. Buying under priced bonds and short sell overpriced ones, then wait them to converge to a fair value and unwind the trade.
